Parameter Value[NMR tube type]: Size and type of Tube used, i.e. '5 mm SampleJet'.
Parameter Value[Solvent]: Solvent used in the NMR sample, i.e. '0.075 M phosphate buffered D2O/H2O'.
Labeled Extract Name: Leave blank if you donâ€™t have one
Label: Name of chemical or biochemical marker used for Labelling, if used, i.e. 'hydrogen molecular entity'.
Parameter Value[Instrument]: Full name of the instrument used, including model number and its operating frequency, i.e. 'Bruker AVANCE NEO 600 MHz spectrometer'.
Parameter Value[NMR Probe]: Full description, including the name and type of probe used, i.e. '5 mm CPQCI 1H/19F/31P/13C/15N/D Z-GRD'. This information can be found in the 'Acquisition Parameter Data File', 'acqus.txt' within the Bruker raw data file structure, in the field marked ' $PROBHD= '.
Parameter Value[Number of transients]: Number of scans acquired, i.e. '64'. This information can be found in the 'Acquisition Parameter Data File', 'acqus.txt' within the Bruker raw data file structure, in the field marked '$NS='.
Parameter Value[Pulse sequence name]: Sequence program used with a short description, i.e. '1D 1H perfect echo with water suppression using excitation sculpting with perfect echo (zgespe)'. This information can be found in the 'Acquisition Parameter Data File', 'acqus.txt' within the Bruker raw data file structure, in the field marked ' $PULPROG= ' and in the file 'pulseprogram.txt'.
Parameter Value[Magnetic field strength]: Magnetic field strength value in Tesla (T), i.e. '14.1'
Acquisition Parameter Data File: i.e. 'FILES/myfilename.zip' OR if in folder structure, 'FILES/RAW_FILES/Subfolder/myfilename.zip'.
Free Induction Decay Data File: i.e. 'FILES/myfilename.zip' OR if in folder structure, 'FILES/RAW_FILES/Subfolder/myfilename.zip'.
Derived Spectral Data File: i.e. 'FILES/myfilename.nmrML' OR if in folder structure, 'FILES/DERIVED_FILES/Subfolder/myfilename.nmrML'.
